name: RandomColorFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Random Color Facts”
”Alexa, ask Random Color Facts to give me a fact”
”Alexa, ask Random Color Facts a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random color facts
des: Random Color Facts is a skill that tries to make the time go by, but while learning some new facts. While color facts may sound boring, they are actually one of the most interesting types of facts that the world can offer, now they are just in an Alexa Skill. Start your color related learning today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
